column1: Uchi////The food here is nothing but amazing.  You can't go wrong with any menu item.  Personal favorites are Aji
column5: and the Sake Toro sashimi is truly melt in your mouth like butter delicious!  The semi freddo  is like no other
column6: or else just have a few pieces of the Foie Nigiri to leave the experience in bliss.  Enjoy!  I finally have a favorite restaurant in Houston.
